Articles.Content:
I'm a little late to the party here (picked up KSP just a few weeks ago) but I am loving populating the Kerbol system using nothing but brute force, manual piloting and the planetary angle calculator.

So far, parties on Mun, Minimus, Duna, and Laythe:

http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197972141782/screenshots/

I can't believe this is still just sandbox mode! The full game is going to be unbelievable!

To all you KSP forum vets, thank you so much. Lurking on your threads the past few weeks taught me everything and gave me infinite wacky ideas. Please continue being an amazing community
